description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Defend the universe from the alien hordes! Ikaroids is a fast-paced, innovative arcade-style shooter with blistering graphics and detailed physics. The game offers a challenging campaign with a variety of twists, turns and surprises and an addictive survival mode that you can challenge alone or with a friend.
